L. rakkaṛ m. ʻ poor soil ʼ;
P. rakkaṛ ʻ hard and barren (of land) ʼ;
M. rakṭẽ n. ʻ contemptuous term for an old or worn or coarse or undersized or tattered blanket or for any old and bad clothing ʼ.
